content: hey fellow crafters I want to talk about a little initiative here I'm gonna do it
the DMS craft right and this is going to center around upcycling you might ask
well it's something you do anyway yeah I've done it for years and a lot of my
projects I'll take trash and make it a treasure so to speak right so I'm gonna
kind of make an official thing and call it crafting right and when you see this
logo right here on my video cards or in my video that means that I'm using some
kind of trash in the video now sometimes it might just be a part of the project
and other times it might be the whole project that I'm up crafting right so
that's I think that's pretty cool and I think we should really encourage this as
you know it's just junk goes to the landfill and just thrown away instead of
we can take that stuff and make it cool stuff at our table just you know save
that kind of stuff to make cool stuff at our table and that's what I do I save
this kind of stuff that looks interesting and turn it into crafts so I
hope you guys enjoy this idea and if you see the up crafting symbol you'll know
that the whole project or just part of the project is from recycled materials
so you guys take care and I'll see you soon with more videos
